title: Pixelmon的权限问题
author: MR爱MC
txt_content:
pixelmon.checkspawns.legendary
这个查询权限是wiki给出来的
现在添加不了
/lp user %player% permission set .checkspawns.legendary true

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: lp user 用户名 permission set minecraft.command.checkspawns

replies.author: MR爱MC
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-26 12:45
lp user 用户名 permission set minecraft.command.checkspawns
那大佬如果放在CC菜单 怎么联动呢？？
item-1-7:
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 3
  COMMAND: 'checkspawns legendary'
  NAME: '&6神兽'
  LORE:
  ID: 41
  DATA-VALUE: 0
  AMOUNT: 1
  KEEP-OPEN: false

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
MR爱MC 发表于 2020-7-26 12:57
那大佬如果放在CC菜单 怎么联动呢？？
item-1-7:
  POSITION-X: 1
用户名改%player%

replies.author: MR爱MC
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-26 12:58
用户名改%player%
会显示是OP指令
所以我想放在CC菜单里面用 只不过好像加上
op:checkspawns legendary
就显示/help

这个命令给权限是无用的
只能op使用我记得是
